row.Docu:
About Automic's JDBC Package ================================
This package contains actions that interact with database management systems via JDBC. The needed JDBC driver's are not included in this package.
One can execute a query directly or provide a file full of queries that are executed sequentially.
=Supported versions=
See http://docs.automic.com/compatibility?len=Package.JDBC&comp=PCK.AUTOMIC_JDBC&version=1.0.0
